content: The staff are absolutely wonderful! The whole experience was not stressful at all. All staff and volunteers are amazing.

Great interface. Easy to use.

Appreciate the reminder notices for upcoming appointments Staff welcoming and professional.

App works well, reminds you of when you can book an appointment, the scheduling function is easy.

Makes it easy to schedule and reschedule appointments. I really like the stat tracking, and the appointment reminders. One reccommendation: please don't have the clinic search default to whole blood. I thought the app wouldn't allow me to book plasma appointments.
replyContent: Hi Melinda, thank you for your comments. You can actually set the default donation type (plasma or whole blood) for the search by going to Account > Settings > Search Options. Cheers.

content: I love this app. I can do the questionnaire and generate my qr code, book appointments and even keep track of my drugs. Very nicely designed and easy to use.

This is a really well made app. My favorite part is that I can fill out the donor questionnaire before I go to the donation clinic. Once it's been completed, a "view Q-pass" button shows up on the app home page. Click on that, and it opens a QR code. When you get to the clinic, just scan the QR code and walk through. All donors should have this app.
Excellent way to handle everything related to scheduling a donation.
Great, functional app.

Very easy to use app. If there's any trouble with it, I can easily contact the support centre and have it rectified. All in all, it's a very streamlined and user friendly app, and makes it very easy to book and review appointments.
Love the ability to quickly and easily book appointments and to see my "stats"!
It's a wonderful way to keep appointments organized

So convenient and easy to use! I never have to use the website anymore, and it has my card and Qpass so I all need is my phone!

Since the COVID-19 started, the app has become useless. Book at your favorite location and they cancel the event about 6 weeks before. You'd think if they have issues with a site, they'd just stop using it completely. Instead they try to transfer the set appointments 15 kms away. If they cancel an event, they should just notify you the appointment is cancelled. If we wanted an appointment at the 2nd location, we would have booked it there. The app needs to do what it is supposed to do.
Amazing staff who are very professional & polite. Always an amazing experience when I donate here! Thank you. Keep up the gr8 work.

The dates just show up as Aug...so you have to click on it to find the date and if the date isn't going to work you have to start all over again, not very user friendly.
replyContent: Hello Don. When logged into the app, the default search start date will be set to your next eligibility date which would be in the future if you just donated. If you have more questions, please call us at 1 888 2 DONATE (1-888-236-6283) or email us at feedback@blood.ca and we can help you.

replyContent: We are sorry for the inconvenience. The website and app do not share the Q-pass that gets generated after you submit your questionnaire. When completed on the website, you must print the Q-pass that gets generated. If done on the app then it will be available on your phone for your appointment. Hopefully this clarification helps. Thank you.

content: Great app. Gives me all the information I need to prepare to donate blood and schedule my appointments in a timely fashion. Thank you.

My experience donating blood in this uncertain time, turned out to be very satisfying & I felt safe throughout the entire process. I was met at the door, my appointment confirmed, & I was guided through each step while staff observed & saw that safe distancing was practiced at all times. A worthwhile reason to leave the house & for those who are unable to contribute in other ways....it's an hour of your time.
It was not obvious how to book a time after selecting a day.

replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review Katherine. It seems you are using an older version of our app. If you want to take advantage of our latest improvements, please go ahead and update to our latest release. Thanks for your support.

Asks you to approve access to contacts in order to book an appointment. If you click continue and deny the phone's allow or deny dialogue box it will still allow you to book the appointment. Why do they need my contacts....?
replyContent: The ‘Contacts permission” is needed to be able to add a reminder event to your calendar. Our app does not use or access your contacts otherwise. If you have any concerns or further questions, please do not hesitate in getting in touch with us at 1 888 2 DONATE (1-888-236-6283) or email us at feedback@blood.ca.

replyContent: Hi Emma... To see other options, you don't need to cancel your existing appointment. You just need to go and try to reschedule it. You will then be able to see all options by selecting to change the donor centre. Hope that helps and thank you for donating.

content: I have an appointment today so I installed this app to do the questionnaire. It's a nice-looking app. Unfortunately, it has asked me twice to "tap here to fill in your questionnaire!", and both times, nothing happened. I also can't figure out a way to manually navigate to the questionnaire.
replyContent: Hi Nina, sorry to hear about that. There is a slight issue with the button highlighting that we are working on. You can find the button on the home screen at the top right. It is a square icon or you may need to click on the three vertical dots to open the menu to see it. This menu option will only be visible on the day of your appointment.

What a great effort to make the process easier. This app is all you need to interact with CBS in every way, removing so many calls, visits, and reminders. It's clean, stable, and easy to use
Quick and easy - makes it a simple process. Also automatically adds the appointment to my phone's calendar.
great. fast and conveniant
Easy to use!! I've been able to book/ change appointments with no issues. Easy to use
Easy to navigate and fully functional. I would recommend people to use this app for convenience.
so easy to manage your appointments
very easy to use.
easy to use
excellent
awesome to use.
Allows me to see easily when I can donate and makes booking simple!
Works great!!!
don't like the new icon

Top notch app, with new features and fixes being added all the time. Worth taking the time to customize the appointment notifications to your preference. Results in an extremely efficient donation process. Keep up the good work
save a life
Great. Easy. Convenient.
Great, easy to use app for a great cause! Simple to book and reschedule appointments with a great homepage to track your total donations!
Bueno!
Great app with lots of info

Logo change and rebranding was a slap in the face to long time donors and recipients. The iconic blood drop with maple leaf that was easily recognizable was replaced with a logo that needs to be explained to be understood, that is a sure sign of a logo fail. uninstalling app and waiting for an agency that cares about their relationships with their donors and uses money to improve services rather than fixing what wasnt broken. CBS board of directors is too out of touch
The app has come a long way since it was first released and is an extremely convenient way to book new blood donation appointments.
It's a great way to keep track of upcoming appointments as well as an easy place to make them. I don't have to carry a card anymore because it's right in the app!
Way easier to search and schedule appointments than on the website or over the phone!
easy to book and reschedule appointments
always times out and personal info not current
replyContent: If you have refreshed your screen and tried logging out/back in and your personal information is still incorrect, please contact us toll-free at 1 888 2 DONATE (1-888-236-6283) or email us directly at feedback@blood.ca and we would be happy to help.

content: Very good and easy to use.
This app is very easy to use!
This app is a great reminder and makes it easy to book an appointment. Awesome work on this app. Thank you.
It's the easiest way to make/ change an appointment to give blood! Great job!
easy to use
Made booking very easy and listed the distance to the donor centres.
makes booking appointments a breeze. Do good people! donate!
I enjoy that I can book online and rebook easily if I ever have to!! love it when apps like this make life easier!!
Seriously phenomenal app. It makes signing up to give blood as simple as possible!
very effective
Give blood! this app needs some work though.
Great! MANY OPTIONS FOR BOOKING, LOCATIONS AND STATS.

Everything you need to give blood. It's your card, your history, your record of meds and travel, your type, hemoglobin, etc. Syncs with your calendar. Makes it all very easy. It's got to be one of the most functional and useful apps out there.
very convenient
I like how easy the app is to use. It's really nice having it automatically entered into my calendar.
Easy to use and very convenient
awesome app. keeps track of stats and appointments.
Very helpful
Probably one of the best designed apps out there. A lot of care was taken to integrate it into the android environment and it has an excellent GUI.
Works like it's supposed to! Able to add information and book appointments with ease. Only used a couple of times, but so far so good.
Gets better and better with every update.
A very positive experience.
awesome
great way to book
Great app, can make your appointments. The younger folk should get on board and start giving. Lessen the pressure on us older folk. Thanks
It is a very user friendly app. With excellent reminders.
Good app with lots of information, but would like it better if you were able to do the eligibility quiz on it and not on the website.
Does what it should
Easy to use to book and manage donation appointments
I can book appointments, look up my donation stats and find out other blood donation information in this app. Very convenient.
Great Easy App!
works great they really hammered out all the bugs now
they asked for 5 stars so I gave it to them. sorta like my blood.
Excellent & convenient method for arranging appointments, and for keeping track of your stats.

As someone who would rather not book appointments over the phone, I love this app. You can see all available times and locations nearby, plus the feature where you can view your hemoglobin and bleed time stats is really neat!
Easy to book appointments, change appointments, and track info. If your a regular donator I recommend.
easy to use
Makes it easy and convenient to schedule blood donations, and you can even see your data for past visits. Great if you want to try and beat your best time!
Makes booking appointments way easier!
Easy to book appointments and fun to track your stats!
It was an incredible experience - wow!
The app improves with each update
Loving all the new updates!
Easy to schedule/change appointments and view your stats and previous appointments.
super easy!
quick and accurate to use!! love the convenience.

Its a pretty good app, lots of info about donating can be found in it and lots of charts and graphs about your donation. My favourite is probably the bleed time chart in your donor stats, me and my family like to "race" each other and see who had the better bleed time.
very convenient!
the app cuts the time out of booking and auto adds to my calenders... which is great. access to hg count is also good.
I love the app!
Useful app. Easy to use once you have all your information inputted.
Agents are always helpful & app makes it easy to book
Seamless operation, non-obtrusive, well-designed interface. Excellent app.
Perfect so far, only had it a couple months.
love having my donation card available at all times, the donation data is pretty fun to keep track of as well.
I give it 5 stars for a good cause, but sometimes it doesn't list any donation clinics in my area on the map for a given date range when in fact there is one.
I absolutely love this app. It is so user-friendly. It updated within one day of my donation, it really helps track donations.
Easy to use and book your appointments in advance. Save your favourite donation sites.
i like the historical data.
Need to incorporate the donation questionnaire.
replyContent: In the latest version, you can complete your questionnaire & get your Q-pass without leaving the app.

content: great app...easy to use and gives great information about how to give, what to expect, and what to do afterward. Really easy to book appointments as well.
Great app for booking donations
Excellent app. Dont need to bring my card anymore and can book through it. even see how long my donation took. neat.
great app.
The new app is really well done as is the branding and messaging. Great job.
app doesn't work properly. no surprise
this app is simple and easy to use. really like it and how easy it is to make an appointment on my lhome to donate.
Incredible user interface. Super intuitive and easy to schedule or reschedule. Makes it a lot easier to plan donating around my busy schedule.
Blood.ca was a way better name. Fire your marketing people.
Amazing and helps me donate when I'm eligible and keeps me on track! Probably the best app on my phone!!!
Really helpful for tracking donations and having one less card in wallet
Very convenient

A great way to manage your blood donations. They have historical notes and provide amazing control of your schedule. It also types your card and other info so you only need to bring your phone to the appointment.
Easy to use. Much more user friendly then older versions!
Great way to keep track of donations, find locations, book your next appointment and even pull up blood type and hemoglobin levels from past donations. Very nice app
Easy to navigate, not too wordy. Very much to the point but with all the info you need!
Super easy to find times to book and can add it to your calendar.
Very user friendly and nice design!
Thank you
So easy and so handy to use!
Easy to use and few bugs
Even better and easier to use than the web version!
Make donating blood so much easier
The app is awesome! The stats are so cool and track up to the day. Very well done, makes donating even easier! 👌
Amazing app... Everything works very well...
Great app, does what it needs to
It is a great app, it even suggests the next appointment, which saves a lot of clicks
Great app. Works good..makes booking appointments easier.
Crashes right away if you're not connected to internet, would be nice if the app at least gave a warning that it needs a connection.
Works great, nice having it for the convenient booking
Very nice and organized for convenience.
Responsive app that is easy to use and intuitive. Nicely done.
Easy to use works great
Very easy to maneuver
This app is garbage it can never find a center for you even in big city areas that have full time donor clinics. Also it doesn't allow you to change or cancel appointments
End the gay blood ban and then maybe you'll get 5 stars
Nice and easy
Awesome.
This app. Is so easy to use...I love that I can keep track of everything!!!
Awesome app, love it!
Very easy to navigate where you want to go. Super easy to book!
Excellent way to book appointments. Very simple and easy to use.

This app still has a bunch of sloppy errors and loose ends. One example: I Tried cancelling an upcoming December appointment, but the little confirmation window that popped up incorrectly displayed an October appointment for cancellation. When searching for available dates to book, I chose a 2 week range in December to search, but it came up with zero available appointments. Also, When searching, donor locations field is sometimes greyed out so I could not select a location.
replyContent:
Hi Dan...We'd be happy to look into why you may be having these issues with your appointment. 
You can give us a call at 1-888-236-6283.

content: Very good app!
App does what it should, allows easy booking, gives interesting statistics about you as a donor and more. Well worth using as a donor.
super well put together. app is very user friendly. thanks for being a part of the road to saving lives
Great design, easy to use
Very convenient and user friendly app. I like it!
